ProjectTitle: STRAtified Dosing based on Augmented renal clearance for CEFtriaxone in patients with severe community-acquired pneumonia: STRADA-CEF trial.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
28/03/2023
Data: please include the ethical approval and privacy register nrs in the DMP (S nr from UZL ethics committee and/or PRET G number); for more information see: https://research.kuleuven.be/en/associatienet/ethics/index
Preservation: please note that clinical trail data should be preserved for 25 years, if you are not sure if this applies to your data please contact the CTC: https://gbiomed.kuleuven.be/english/ctc

21/03/2023
The text of the questions in your DMP template are missing. Please go back to your DMP in DMPonline.be and in the download section  select the box "question text and section headings" and "unanswered questions" and download and submit your DMP again.
